backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Land a time to meet about Project Alpha with Chris, Sangya, and Kat for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks. Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed and work around Kat's schedule. Make the meeting in person and add a room.

gutts.name: Parse Meeting Intent
gutts.capability: Extract the core intent to schedule a meeting from the user prompt
gutts.user_goal: Identify that the user wants to schedule a meeting
gutts.evidence: Detects that the user wants to arrange a meeting about Project Alpha

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Subject
gutts.capability: Identify the topic of the meeting from the prompt
gutts.evidence: Extracts 'Project Alpha' as the meeting topic

gutts.name: Extract Participants
gutts.capability: Identify all participants mentioned in the prompt
gutts.user_goal: Know who should attend the meeting
gutts.evidence: Extracts Chris, Sangya, and Kat as participants

gutts.name: Resolve Participant Identities
gutts.capability: Match participant names to calendar/contact identities
gutts.evidence: Maps 'Chris', 'Sangya', and 'Kat' to their respective calendar accounts

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Duration
gutts.capability: Determine the length of the meeting
gutts.evidence: Identifies '1 hour' as the meeting duration

gutts.name: Extract Scheduling Window
gutts.capability: Identify the time range for scheduling
gutts.evidence: Extracts 'next 2 weeks' as the scheduling window

gutts.name: Retrieve Participant Calendars
gutts.capability: Access the calendars of all participants
gutts.user_goal: Get availability data for all attendees
gutts.evidence: Fetches free/busy data for Chris, Sangya, and Kat

gutts.name: Apply Scheduling Constraints
gutts.capability: Incorporate user-specified rules into scheduling logic
gutts.evidence: Understands 'schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed' and 'work around Kat's schedule'

gutts.name: Prioritize Kat's Availability
gutts.capability: Ensure Kat's schedule is given priority
gutts.user_goal: Work around Kat's schedule as requested
gutts.evidence: Marks Kat's availability as a hard constraint in scheduling

gutts.name: Allow Overriding 1:1 and Lunch Events
gutts.capability: Permit scheduling over certain event types if necessary
gutts.user_goal: Increase flexibility by allowing some conflicts
gutts.evidence: Identifies 1:1 and lunch events as overridable

gutts.name: Find Optimal Meeting Slot
gutts.capability: Compute the best time slot satisfying constraints and preferences
gutts.user_goal: Select a suitable time for all participants
gutts.evidence: Chooses a 1-hour slot within the next 2 weeks that meets all rules

gutts.name: Determine Meeting Location Type
gutts.capability: Identify that the meeting should be in person
gutts.evidence: Extracts 'Make the meeting in person' from the prompt

gutts.name: Reserve Physical Room
gutts.capability: Book an available room for the meeting
gutts.user_goal: Secure a physical location for the meeting
gutts.evidence: Finds and reserves a suitable meeting room

gutts.name: Create Calendar Event
gutts.capability: Generate the meeting event with all details
gutts.user_goal: Finalize the meeting in the calendar system
gutts.evidence: Creates an event with title 'Project Alpha', participants, time, duration, and location

gutts.name: Add Participants to Event
gutts.capability: Include all required attendees in the event
gutts.user_goal: Ensure all specified people are invited
gutts.evidence: Adds Chris, Sangya, and Kat to the event

gutts.name: Attach Meeting Location to Event
gutts.capability: Add the reserved room to the event details
gutts.user_goal: Include location information in the event
gutts.evidence: Sets the reserved room as the meeting location

gutts.name: Send Invitations
gutts.capability: Dispatch calendar invites to all participants
gutts.evidence: Sends event invitations to Chris, Sangya, and Kat
